content: a free version of this pattern can be found on my blog here 1 constructed entirely of crocheted squares the helios poncho is named for the greek god of the sun due to the sunburst pattern created with both the stitches and color change yarn this easy level pattern is the perfect on-the-go project as you can make one square at time and seam them together later wear your poncho over a simple tank in warmer weather or layer it up over a turtleneck once the temperatures dip shop the full kit here 2 **sizes** xs/s/m l/xl 2xl/3xl 4xl/5xl suggested positive ease 30-40 /76-101 5cm
